comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Registers a block custom component that can be used in block JSON configuration.

comments.name: param
comments.value:
The id that represents this custom component. Must have a namespace.
This id can be specified in a block's JSON configuration under the 'minecraft:custom_components' block component.

comments.name: param
comments.value: The collection of event functions that will be called when the event occurs on a block using this custom component id.
